JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW THURSDAY ,THE O3RD DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 13TH POUSHA, 1940 Cr1.MC.No. 3 of 2019 IN cc 260/2017 of JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT, CHAVARA CRIME NO. 291/2017 OF THEKKUMBHAGOM POLICE STATION , Kollam PETITIONERS /ACCUSED :- JOMY AGED 39 YEARS S/O. JAMES, JOMY LNAD, KOYIVILA MURI, KOYIVILA P.O, THEVALAKKARA VILLAGE, KOLLAM DISTRICT. BY ADV. SRI.K.V.ANIL KUMAR RESPONDENTS/STATE & COMPLAINANT :- 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM 682 031. 2 THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE CHAVARA THEKKUMBHAGAM POLICE STATION, KOLLAM DISTRICT 691 O01 3 ANTONY AGED 53 YEARS s/o. PETER, KANNIMELVILAYIL VEEDU, KOYIVILA P.O, KOYIVILA MURI, THEVALAKKARA VILLAGE, KOLLAM DISTRICT 690 524 BY ADV. SRI.P.V.DILEEP RL & R2 BY SRI ALEX M THOMBRA-PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 03.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Des Tal Oa Crl.MC.No. 3 of 2019 2019 KERIS 2 ORDER Petition filed under section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. Petitioner is the accused in C.C.No.260 of 2017 on the file of the Judicial Magistrate of First Class, Chavara registered for the offences under sections 294(b), 323, 324 and 341 IPC. The third respondent is the victim. It is submitted that the matter has been settled and the proceedings in the trial court may be quashed. 3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner and third respondent and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4. I have perused the affidavit filed by the third respondent, who has entered appearance through counsel. I am satisfied that the matter has been settled and no public interest is involved in this case. There is no impediment for granting the prayer of the petitioners. In the result, this Crl.M.C is allowed. The proceedings in C.C.No.260 of 2017 on the file of the Des Tal F can | op Crl.MC.No. 3 of 2019 2019 KERIS 3 Judicial Magistrate of First Class, Chavara are quashed. If any material objects have been produced in this case, the trial court may pass appropriate orders for their disposal. Sd/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW, JUDGE SMA Tes Tal | ieee Cri.MC.No. 3 of 2019 2019/KER/S A APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S ANNEXURES :- ANNEXURE A A TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO. 2911/2017 OF CHAVARA THERKKUMBHAGAM POLICE STATION.
